Reviews.Title: fid a
Reviews.Author: fidencio
Reviews.Content: i gave 4 stars 'cause the tiny door for the memory card is too weak and it's broken now-i have to use a duct tape to lock it-but still working well-simple to use,i like it

Reviews.Title: Samsung TL210 DualView
Reviews.Author: DonZ
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product as a warranty replacement for the top model in the dualview line. I was surprised how much I like it. The only real difference is that it doesn't have the touch screen. However, for the value it is a great camera. Picture quality is great. I would definately recommend.

ProductInfo.Name: Samsung TL210 DualView 12MP Green Digital Camera
